title: FK Žitorađa
text:
FK Žitorađa () is a <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="%C5%BDitora%C4%91a">Žitorađa</a>, <a href="Serbia">Serbia</a>. They currently compete in the Zone League South, the fourth tier of the <a href="Serbian%20football%20league%20system">national league system</a>.
History.
The club made its <a href="Second%20League%20of%20FR%20Yugoslavia">Second League of FR Yugoslavia</a> debut in <a href="2000%E2%80%9301%20Second%20League%20of%20FR%20Yugoslavia">2000</a>. They spent three seasons in the second tier, before being relegated to the <a href="Serbian%20League%20East">Serbian League East</a> in <a href="2002%E2%80%9303%20Second%20League%20of%20Serbia%20and%20Montenegro">2003</a>.
Honours.
<a href="Ni%C5%A1%20Zone%20League">Niš Zone League</a> (Tier 4)
